description: Get a list of bot recommendations that meet the specified criteria.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bot that contains the bot recommendation list.

parameters.name: botVersion
parameters.description: The version of the bot that contains the bot recommendation list.

parameters.name: localeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the language and locale of the bot recommendation list.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the bot that contains the bot recommendation list.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot that contains the bot recommendation list.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the language and locale of the bot recommendation list.

nested_items.name: botRecommendationSummaries
nested_items.description: Summary information for the bot recommendations that meet the filter specified in this request. The length of the list is specified in the maxResults parameter of the request. If there are more bot recommendations available, the nextToken field contains a token to get the next page of results.

nested_items.name: botRecommendationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the bot recommendation.

nested_items.name: botRecommendationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the bot recommendation to be updated.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp of the date and time that the bot recommendation was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp of the date and time that the bot recommendation was last updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that indicates whether there are more results to return in a response to the ListBotRecommendations operation. If the nextToken field is present, you send the contents as the nextToken parameter of a ListBotRecommendations operation request to get the next page of results.
